name: md2pdf
description: Markdown to PDF converter with GFM support

scripts.build:all: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/md2pdf-linux && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/md2pdf-macos && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/md2pdf-windows.exe
